C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: sqream-worker

command: (nmap -p 5000 127.0.0.1 |grep open) || (APISERVER='https://kubernetes.default.svc' && SERVICEACCOUNT='/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount' && NAMESPACE=$(cat ${SERVICEACCOUNT}/namespace) && TOKEN=$(cat ${SERVICEACCOUNT}/token) && CACERT="${SERVICEACCOUNT}/ca.crt" && header_str="Authorization:"" Bearer ${TOKEN}" && if [ ! -z $POD_NAME ]; then curl --silent --cacert "${CACERT}" --header "${header_str}" -X DELETE "${APISERVER}/api/v1/namespaces/$NAMESPACE/pods/$POD_NAME/"; fi )

/bin/bash <<'EOF'
APISERVER=https://kubernetes.default.svc; 
SERVICEACCOUNT=/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount
NAMESPACE=$(cat ${SERVICEACCOUNT}/namespace)
TOKEN=$(cat ${SERVICEACCOUNT}/token)
CACERT=${SERVICEACCOUNT}/ca.crt

read pod_image pod_replicaset is_forced_restart < <( \
  echo $(curl --silent --cacert ${CACERT} --header "Authorization: Bearer ${TOKEN}" -X GET ${APISERVER}/api/v1/namespaces/$NAMESPACE/pods/$POD_NAME/ | \
  jq -r '.spec.containers[0].image, .metadata.ownerReferences[0].name, .metadata.annotations."stop-worker"'))
read deploy_image deploy_revision < <( \
  echo $(curl --silent --cacert ${CACERT} --header "Authorization: Bearer ${TOKEN}" -X GET ${APISERVER}/apis/apps/v1/namespaces/$NAMESPACE/deployments/sqream-worker-0/ | \
  jq -r '.spec.template.spec.containers[0].image, .metadata.annotations."deployment.kubernetes.io/revision"'))
replicaset_revision=$(curl --silent --cacert ${CACERT} --header "Authorization: Bearer ${TOKEN}" -X GET  ${APISERVER}/apis/apps/v1/namespaces/$NAMESPACE/replicasets/$pod_replicaset/ | \
  jq -r .metadata.annotations.\"deployment.kubernetes.io/revision\" )

if [ $deploy_revision -ne $replicaset_revision ] || [ $pod_image !=  $deploy_image ]; then
  can_remove_pod=$(curl --silent -X GET "http://esm:8080/getCanDeleteRTC/${POD_NAME}") || can_remove_pod='true'

  while ! [ $can_remove_pod = 'true' ] && [ $is_forced_restart != '1' ]
  do
    sleep 60
    can_remove_pod=$(curl --silent  -X GET "http://esm:8080/getCanDeleteRTC/${POD_NAME}") || can_remove_pod='true'
    read is_forced_restart < <( \
      echo $(curl --silent --cacert ${CACERT} --header "Authorization: Bearer ${TOKEN}" -X GET ${APISERVER}/api/v1/namespaces/$NAMESPACE/pods/$POD_NAME/ | \
      jq -r '.metadata.annotations."stop-worker"'))
  done
fi

EOF
